author: Mikha Vergara
comment: Good so far. Lags a bit.

author: John Shaw
comment: Works really well! I haven't run into any issues. The only thing I'd like to see added is the ability to hide the settings icons, because they can take up a lot of screen space (especially when using the rear camera).

author: Colin Campbell
comment: I used to have pixtocam which disappeared from the app store, so I found this app which works the same but I think the image quality is not as good. Maybe that could be improved?

reply.author: Makeev Apps
reply.content: Hi Colin! Do you mean preview image quality?

author: Alexander Mikheev
comment: It doesn't work with standard camera. Looks like a kind of workaround or something.

author: Blas Benoit
comment: They actually fix almost every issue i read in the comments

author: Jaber Ahmed
comment: Had to pay for it twice!!!! Daylight Robbery

reply.author: Makeev Apps
reply.content: Hi, Jaber! Please write your purchase bill to wear.camera@gmail.com

comment: How do you install it on watch?

reply.author: Makeev Apps
reply.content: Hi, Juan! Please write more details to wear.camera@gmail.com

author: M Secchi
comment: Works perfectly on Huawei watch 2

author: Crystal Ng Ctal
comment: does it work with iPhone

reply.author: Makeev Apps
reply.content: Hi, Crystal! No. App doesn't work with iPhone.

author: Ivan Vazquez
comment: Not working (the progress spinner just spins, app never loads) on Q Marshal Fosil smartwatch with Android Wear 2.0.  Where can I get my Refund?

reply.author: Makeev Apps
reply.content: Hi, Ivan! We fixed this bug in v3.7. Try it!

comment: I have purchased it on my huawei watch but it was prompting me to install it on my pHone. So when I was directed to my phone 's Google Play Store again 2 times my amount was deducted but the app was not installing. Please refund all my amount. Thanks.

reply.author: Makeev Apps
reply.content:
Hi, Nahum!
Please, send your purchace info to wear.camera@gmail.com

author: Felix Suganda
comment: works perfectly with polar m600 and Samsung S7edge

comment: Not working (the progress spinner just spins, app never loads) on LG Watch Sport with Android Wear 2.0.

author: أ.د.أسامه كمال شعير
comment: Only think it needs is an indicator that video recording is in progress. For example, while recording, change the colour of the recording button.
title: Excellent app

comment: Now when i attempt to open on watch show me and error message "unfortunately wear has storp... Galaxy S4 (lollipop)+ Gear Live

comment: Doesn't install onto my LG G Watch R. No support from developer!

reply.author: Makeev Apps
reply.content: Please, write your device model and Android version to wear.camera@gmail.com. Thank you

author: Phil Harnett
comment: This is an app that does exactly what they say it does. It's reliable and well laid out and deserves the 5 stars.
title: Fantastic App

author: Jeremy Scheifflee
comment: Does what it says, has a lot of features, I use it all the time!
title: Great App, really like it!

author: Chuck Williams
comment: Works very good I like it
title: Cool app

author: chris ngai
comment: App crashes on my nexus 6p running marshmallow.
title: Crashes

author: Rowan Allard
comment: Now works over wi-fi, which is awesome!
title: Great Camera App For Wear!

author: Володимир Єрмак
comment: Slow camera previewing.

author: Hakob Sununu
comment: Good App

author: Salvador Santiago
comment: Even better than PixtoCam, which stops the recording when the watch goes on standby. Only thing that would make it even better is if recordings can be made to the external card. Alternatively at least to a more reachable folder instead of 4 levels down. Keep up the good work!
title: Best Camera Remote App!

author: Barry Morgan
comment: Seems to work well but no zoom on front camera and rear camera is barely anything but snow?
title: Snowy rear camera

author: Tony Nuñez
comment: Couldn't: start/stop video recorder, change to 1080p, didn't give live view of camera. Tended to lock up and become unresponsive. Got a refund. fix and we'll try again. Using One Plus 2 with LG G watch R.
title: Didn't fully work

author: John L. Stanley
comment: Worked well over Bluetooth.  Excellent camera functionality.  Did not work reliably (black watch screen and phone got very sluggish) when going in and out of Bluetooth range and when watch was linked to phone via WiFi.  (Samsung S3 phone & Sony Smartwatch 3)  Needs work in error handling and switching network modes.
title: OK, not great

author: Vid Headz
comment: Installed but had no Icon to start app.  Galaxy Note 5 - android 5.1.1

reply.author: Makeev Apps
reply.content: Hello. Look icon on your Android watch. Write to wear.camera@gmail.com if you have other questions. Thank you

title: No Icon
